amendment.description: To require reports on mental health services available to members of the Armed Forces of the United States and their dependents.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3542 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3542 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator DeWine. (consideration: CR S7382-7383; text: CR S7383) To require reports on mental health services available to members of the Armed Forces of the United States and their dependents.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3542 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3542 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator DeWine.
